abstract: Facing only minimal competition, Fox dominated the ratings on Wednesday, earning 23.3 million viewers for the weekly results episode of “American Idol,” according to Nielsen’s estimates.
snippet: Facing only minimal competition, Fox dominated the ratings on Wednesday, earning 23.3 million viewers for the weekly results episode of “American Idol,” according to Nielsen’s estimates.
lead_paragraph: Facing only minimal competition, Fox dominated the ratings on Wednesday, earning 23.3 million viewers for the weekly results episode of “American Idol,” according to Nielsen’s estimates. In addition to the 9 p.m. hour with “Idol,” Fox also won the earlier 8 p.m. time slot with “Lie to Me” despite its much smaller audience of 7.9 million.

headline.main: Ratings: Networks Barely Bother to Compete With ‘Idol’
